0.name: Percipience, Silent Dawn
0.fullDesc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy, with a <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target. Additionally, when attacking a target that suffers Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock, there is respectively a <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong> base chance of inflicting 1 extra stack of Arcana on the target.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy and has a chance of applying Arcana to the target. After attacking a target that suffers <orangeStrong>Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock</orangeStrong>, there is respectively a chance of <orangeStrong>additionally applying Arcana</orangeStrong>.

0.name: Decadence, False Twilight
0.fullDesc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy and any adjacent targets. At the same time, there is a {{2, percent}}% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target enemy and the adjacent targets. Additionally, there is a {{3, percent}}% base chance of reducing the DEF of the target enemy and the adjacent targets by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{5}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy target and any adjacent targets, with a high chance of <orangeStrong>inflicting Arcana</orangeStrong> on the targets and lowering their DEF.

0.name: Bliss of Otherworld's Embrace
0.fullDesc:
Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies for {{2}} turn(s).
While afflicted with Epiphany, enemies take {{3, percent}}% increased DMG in their turn. Additionally, if enemies are also inflicted with Arcana, they are considered to be simultaneously afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock. After Arcana causes DMG at the start of each turn, its stacks are not reset. This non-reset effect of Arcana stacks can be triggered up to {{4}} time(s) for the duration of Epiphany. And the trigger count resets when Epiphany is applied again.
Deals Wind DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of Black Swan's ATK to all enemies.
0.shortDesc: Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies, increasing the DMG the targets take in their turn. Additionally, <orangeStrong>having Arcana is regarded as having Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock</orangeStrong>. Furthermore, Arcana will not reset its stacks after causing DMG at the start of the next turn. Deals Wind DMG to all enemies.

0.name: Loom of Fate's Caprice
0.fullDesc:
Every time an enemy target receives DoT at the start of each turn, there is a {{2, percent}}% base chance for it to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana.
While afflicted with Arcana, enemy targets receive Wind DoT equal to {{1, percent}}% of Black Swan's ATK at the start of each turn. Each stack of Arcana increases this DMG multiplier by {{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%. Then Arcana resets to 1 stack. Arcana can stack up to {{8}} times.
Only when Arcana causes DMG at the start of an enemy target's turn, Black Swan triggers additional effects based on the number of Arcana stacks inflicted on the target:
When there are {{4}} or more Arcana stacks, deals Wind DoT equal to {{5, percent}}% of Black Swan's ATK to adjacent targets, with a {{2, percent}}% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on adjacent targets.
When there are {{6}} or more Arcana stacks, enables the current DoT dealt this time to ignore {{7, percent}}% of the target's and adjacent targets' DEF.
0.shortDesc: When an enemy target receives DoT at the start of each turn, there is a chance for it to be inflicted with Arcana. They receive <orangeStrong>Wind DoT</orangeStrong> at the start of the turn, and Black Swan triggers <orangeStrong>additional effects</orangeStrong> based on the number of Arcana stacks.

0.name: From Façade to Vérité
0.fullDesc: After this Technique is used, there is a {{1, percent}}% base chance for each enemy to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana at the start of the next battle. For each successful application of Arcana on a target, inflicts another stack of Arcana on the same target. This process repeats until Arcana fails to be inflicted on this target. For each successive application of Arcana on a target, its base chance of success is equal to {{2, percent}}% of the base chance of the previous successful infliction of Arcana on that target.
0.shortDesc: After this Technique is used, at the start of the next battle, there is a high chance for each enemy to be <orangeStrong>inflicted with Arcana repeatedly until Arcana fails to be inflicted</orangeStrong>.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Viscera's Disquiet
0.fullDesc: After using Skill to attack one designated enemy that has Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock, each of these debuffs respectively has a {{1, percent}}% base chance of inflicting 1 extra stack of Arcana.

0.name: Goblet's Dredges
0.fullDesc:
When an enemy target enters battle, there is a {{1, percent}}% base chance for it to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana.
Every time an enemy target receives 1 instance of DoT during a single attack by an ally, there is a {{1, percent}}% base chance for the target to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana. The maximum number of stacks that can be inflicted during 1 single attack is {{2}}.

0.name: Candleflame's Portent
0.fullDesc: Increases this unit's DMG by an amount equal to {{1, percent}}% of Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum DMG increase of {{2, percent}}%.

1.name: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
1.desc: While Black Swan is active in battle, enemies afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock will have their corresponding Wind, Physical, Fire, or Lightning RES respectively reduced by {{1, percent}}%.

2.name: Weep Not For Me, My Lamb
2.desc: When an enemy target afflicted with "Arcana" is defeated, there is a {{1, percent}}% base chance of inflicting {{2}} stack(s) of "Arcana" on adjacent targets.

3.name: As Above, So Below
3.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

4.name: In Tears We Gift
4.desc: While in the Epiphany state, enemy targets have their Effect RES reduced by {{1, percent}}% and Black Swan regenerates {{2}} Energy at the start of these targets' turns or when they are defeated. This Energy Regeneration effect can only trigger up to 1 time while Epiphany lasts. The trigger count is reset when Epiphany is applied again.

5.name: Linnutee Flyway
5.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.name: Pantheon Merciful, Masses Pitiful
6.desc:
When an enemy target is attacked by Black Swan's teammates, Black Swan has a {{2, percent}}% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of "Arcana" on the target.
Every time Black Swan inflicts "Arcana" on an enemy target, there is a {{1, percent}}% fixed chance to additionally increase the number of "Arcana" stacked this time by {{3}}.
